ygData.subject: Re: Condor:
ygData.msgSnippet: Motormaster walks into the control room, still holding the two damaged robots. He sees all the new faces. Seems like introductions are in order. Wildrider,

Motormaster walks into the control room, still holding the two damaged
robots. He sees all the new faces. "Seems like introductions are in order.
Wildrider, take these two to the infermary" as he finishes that he chucks
Dead-End at Wildrider. Wildrider crumples under the robot, more from
surprise, "uh, sure thing boss, ha aha ha, look at you Dead End, youre a
mess" he starts to carry on a conversation with the stasis-locked robot, as
he heads towards the elevator.

Motormaster looks to the other Decepticons. "And you are"
